name: Paul C
message:
I want a part of this, if it ever happens. I have the movie on VHS, however, I want a copy on DVD, if it's possible.
I have thought about converting it myself, but an original copy on DVD would be totally awesome. If it is a petition you want, put my name down mate, I'm there with pen in hand.
This is one hell of a movie.
Good luck with the attempt.
